search_results.title: Carl Anderson - Author Bio
search_results.snippet: Carl Anderson is an internationally recognized expert in writing instruction for grades K-8. He works as a consultant in schools and districts around the world.

search_results.title: About Carl
search_results.snippet: Carl has been an educator for over 25 years. He has held a variety of positions in both multiple districts, from 1st grade teacher to Director of Innovation & ...

search_results.title: Carl Freedman (writer)
search_results.snippet: Carl Howard Freedman (born 1951) is an American writer, literary theorist and professor of English literature at Louisiana State University.
